header.description:
§☆"Modifies" TNT in a way that allows it to drop the blocks it explodes 100% of the time.
Requires §bGameTest Framework§r
Setup commands require the §badmin§r tag to use. By default the system is disabled.
- Enable the module: §b-tnt enable§r
- Disable the module: §b-tnt disable§r
- Check if enabled: §b-tnt isenabled§r

Designed by §ccda94581§r, MIT License
header.name: TNT Dropping v1.19.0
